data.actual_result: The Invite Link Embed [x online] counter still takes into account members set to 'invisible'
data.expected_result: The Invite Link Embed [x online] counter should not take into account 'invisible' members
data.short_description: Invite Link Embeds [x online] counter takes into account people set to 'invisible'
data.steps_to_repro: - Example: A server of 2 people. One person online and one offline - The counter shows [1 online] - The offline person logs in with the status 'Invisible' - The counter shows [2 online]
